Reproduce Deep Learning and Machine Learning experiments with a click of button using Grid.ai Run Badge ![Grid Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/rid_AI-run-78FF96.svg?labelColor=black&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,).

The badge is a `HTTP GET` request that encodes [`grid run`](https://docs.grid.ai/products/global-cli-configs/cli-api/grid-train#command-structure) `Grid flags` and `Script flags`.  The `grid run` has the following structure:

```bash
grid run [..Grid flags...] hello.py [...Script flag...]
```

This tutorial shows how to:
- [Display Grid.ai Run Badge](#display-gridai-run-badge)
- [Specify Grid Flags](#specify-grid-flags)
  - [Take Default Values](#take-default-values)
  - [set Grid Flags](#set-grid-flags)
- [Specify Script Flags](#specify-script-flags)
  - [Hyperparameter Sweeps style](#hyperparameter-sweeps-style)

# Display Grid.ai Run Badge

To show Grid AI Run Badge in markdown 

![Grid Run](https://img.shields.io/badge/rid_AI-run-78FF96.svg?labelColor=black&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)

```bash
![Grid Run](https://img.shields.io/badge/rid_AI-run-78FF96.svg?labelColor=black&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)
```

# Specify Grid Flags

## Take Default Values
The following are required with working example below:
- GitHub repo name:  https://github.com/robert-s-lee/grid-optuna
- commit id: `dbb7c20cad6bfb419a037f8ff93cb9774fedb2e5`
- script name: `pytorch_lightning_simple.py`

[![Single Run](https://img.shields.io/badge/rid_AI-run-78FF96.svg?labelColor=black&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://platform.grid.ai/#/runs?script=https://github.com/robert-s-lee/grid-optuna/blob/dbb7c20cad6bfb419a037f8ff93cb9774fedb2e5/pytorch_lightning_simple.py)

```bash
[![Single Run](https://img.shields.io/badge/rid_AI-run-78FF96.svg?labelColor=black&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://platform.grid.ai/#/runs?script=https://github.com/robert-s-lee/grid-optuna/blob/dbb7c20cad6bfb419a037f8ff93cb9774fedb2e5/pytorch_lightning_simple.py)
```

## set Grid Flags

To specified additional Grid.ai parameters 
- `cloud=grid`
- `instance=t2.large` 
- `accelerators=1` CPUs per Experiment
- `disk_size=300`
- `framework=lightning`

[![Single Run](https://img.shields.io/badge/rid_AI-run-78FF96.svg?labelColor=black&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://platform.grid.ai/#/runs?script=https://github.com/robert-s-lee/grid-optuna/blob/dbb7c20cad6bfb419a037f8ff93cb9774fedb2e5/pytorch_lightning_simple.py&cloud=grid&spot&instance=t2.large&grid_cpus=2&disk_size=300&framework=lightning)

```bash
[![Single Run](https://img.shields.io/badge/rid_AI-run-78FF96.svg?labelColor=black&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://platform.grid.ai/#/runs?script=https://github.com/robert-s-lee/grid-optuna/blob/dbb7c20cad6bfb419a037f8ff93cb9774fedb2e5/pytorch_lightning_simple.py&cloud=grid&spot&instance=t2.large&grid_cpus=2&disk_size=300&framework=lightning)
```
# Specify Script Flags

## Hyperparameter Sweeps style

8x Parallel Hyperparameter Sweeps with the following values:
- `%20--pruning%20"[0,1]"` the same as `--pruning "[0,1]"`
- `%20--batchsize%20"[32,128]"` the same as `--batchsize "[32,128]"`
- `%20--epochs%20"[5,10]"` the same as `--epochs "[5,10]"`

[![Single Run](https://img.shields.io/badge/rid_AI-run-78FF96.svg?labelColor=black&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://platform.grid.ai/#/runs?script=https://github.com/robert-s-lee/grid-optuna/blob/dbb7c20cad6bfb419a037f8ff93cb9774fedb2e5/pytorch_lightning_simple.py&cloud=grid&use_spot&instance=t2.medium&accelerators=1&disk_size=200&framework=lightning&script_args=pytorch_lightning_simple.py%20--pruning%20"[0,1]"%20--batchsize%20"[32,128]"%20--epochs%20"[5,10]")

```bash
[![Single Run](https://img.shields.io/badge/rid_AI-run-78FF96.svg?labelColor=black&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,)](https://platform.grid.ai/#/runs?script=https://github.com/robert-s-lee/grid-optuna/blob/dbb7c20cad6bfb419a037f8ff93cb9774fedb2e5/pytorch_lightning_simple.py&cloud=grid&use_spot&instance=t2.medium&accelerators=1&disk_size=200&framework=lightning&script_args=pytorch_lightning_simple.py%20--pruning%20"[0,1]"%20--batchsize%20"[32,128]"%20--epochs%20"[5,10]")
```
